title: Ticket #4109: Windows msi installer does not provide VMWARE_LOCAL_SETTINGS_FILE
description:
The default condor_config on Windows has 

    VMWARE_LOCAL_SETTINGS_FILE = $(RELEASE_DIR)\condor_vmware_local_settings

But it does not create the file, and the vm-gahp won't run if the knob defines a file but the file doesn't exist. This is different from the *nix config file, which has this definition commented out.

it should be commented out by default on Windows as well
